resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205809</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Artistic Exchange: Europe and the Islamic World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künstlerischer Austausch: Europa und die 
islamische Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échange Artistique : l'Europe et le monde 
islamique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troca Artística: Europa e o mundo islamic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio Artistico: Europa ed il mondo 
islamico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλλιτεχνική ανταλλαγή: Ευρώπη και ο ισλαμικός 
κόσμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intercambio Artístico: Europa y el mundo 
islámico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents 31 paintings, bowls, and other objects that illustrate the Islamic world's influence on European art. Elements of Islamic art are identified in each of the European pieces, which date back to the Middle Ages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt 31 Anstriche, Schüsseln und andere 
Nachrichten dar, die den islamische Einfluß der Welt auf europäische
kunst veranschaulichen. Elemente der islamischen kunst werden in
jedem der europäischen Stücke gekennzeichnet, die auf dem mittleren 
Alter zurückgehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente 31 peintures, cuvettes, et d'autres 
objets qui illustrent l'influence du monde islamique sur l'art 
européen. Des éléments de l'art islamique sont identifiés 
dans chacun des morceaux européens, qui remontent aux âges moyens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta 31 pinturas, bacias, e outros objetos 
que ilustram a influência do mundo islamic na arte européia. 
Os elementos da arte islamic são identificados em cada uma das 
partes européias, que datam das idades médias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta 31 pittura, le ciotole ed altri oggetti 
che illustrano l'influenza del mondo islamico sull'arte europea. 
Gli elementi dell'arte islamica sono identificati in ciascuna 
delle parti europee, che resalgono Medio Evo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει 31 έργα ζωγραφικής, κύπελλα, και άλλα 
αντικείμενα που επεξηγούν την επιρροή του ισλαμικού κόσμου στα 
ευρωπαϊκά στοιχεία αρθ. της ισλαμικής τέχνης προσδιορίζονται σε 
κάθε ένα από τα ευρωπαϊκά κομμάτια, τα οποία χρονολογούνται 
από τις μέσες ηλικίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta 31 pinturas, los tazones de fuente, y 
otros objetos que ilustren la influencia del mundo islámico en arte 
europeo. Los elementos del arte islámico se identifican en cada
uno de los pedazos europeos, que datan de las edades medias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205809</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103086</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/artistic-exchange-europe-and-the-islamic-world</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
